name: Enervate
description:
Controls

W/A/S/D - Move

Shift + Move Direction - Teleport

Spacebar - Absorb Counter

Left Click - Fire Magic At Cursor

Enervate! In Enervate, you play as a wizard taking their final exam at the Acadamae. Your test? To master Counter Spell. Rack up points by dispatching elemental golems. Careful, though. Each golem has a different attack type and requires different timing to properly counter. When you successfully counter a golem's attack, you absorb their power and gain 1 charge of their attack type to send back at them (you can also use a charge to blink in a pinch!). Lastly, some golems will drop cores that you can run over to absorb which will completely fill up your energy bar. How many golems can you take out before you are overwhelmed?

Uses Lootlocker for Leaderboards. All other assets made from scratch for Score Jam 20

Dev/Programing - Greg Young, Dev/Art - Gray O'Reilly, Music - Mark Fearson, Sound FX - Kennedy O'Donnell

[Apologies - Score was not resetting on death. This has been fixed]
